sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Weathercard = ({tempInfo}) => { const{ temp, pressure, humidity, weathermood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; // converting second to time let sec = sunset; let date = new Date(sec *1000); let time = `${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()}}`; return (
{temp}°
sunny
{name},{country}
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/* our four column section */}

{sunset}
{time}

{humidity}
Humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

{speed}
Speed

) } export default Weathercard
